attributes.action: review, with a view to increasing, all speed limits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Look at the leaps and bounds that technology has taken since these limits were last reviewed, and increase the speed limits. A blanket increase of 10 miles per hour on all existing limits would be a good start.

Most people, it seems, drive faster than the speed limit anyway. 

This could free up police time and allow them to fight the real criminals. 

All drivers pay a lot of money to use the roads and we should be listened to. This is not a request for an email response about why we cannot do this, but a call for action.
